# Lotto [(by TerrierDarts)](https://www.twitch.tv/terrierdarts)

This Game will allow your viewers to try their luck at getting there hands on some big prizes, with plently of customisation this will add another cool dynamic to your streams!

## Import Code

```text

```

## Code Pen (Optional)

* [The Codepen *Follow this link to get access to the codepen I used for the Visuals*](https://codepen.io/terrierdarts/pen/JjMRRKv)
{.links-list}

In order to install this codepen, you will need to follow the link then press `Export` from the bottom right, then press `Export .Zip`

Then you will need to extract the files to somewhere safe. Inside the folder you will have a `dist` folder inside that they will be a `index` file. Open that and it should open in a web browser. Copy and paste the url and create a browser source with that url.
> **DO NOT TICK 'LOCAL FILE' WHEN DOING THIS** 
> 
> {.is-danger}

## Configuration

You will need the following References in order to make the codes compile.

```text
mscorlib.dll
System.Linq.dll
System.Net.dll
```

You Will also need to add the codepen Url to `urlPath` You Will also need to create a `.txt` file and give it a name, put it some where safe and paste the location in `filePath`. Then in **Lotto Draw** you will need to make sure that the subAction "OBS Set Browser Source" is pointing to the newly created browser source.

You will need to set up the following commands.

```text
!buytickets,!buyticket  = Tied to Lotto Ticket
!lottodraw              = Tied to Lotto Draw
!tickets                = Tied to Lotto NumberOfTicket
```

> You can set **Lotto Draw** as a Channel Point Redeem if you wish if you want the viewers to decide when a draw is  done! 
> 
> {.is-info}

## Editable Settings

### Lotto Draw

`prize3` This is the prize for matching 3 numbers. `prize4` This is the prize for matching 4 numbers. `prize5` This is the prize for matching 5 numbers. `filePath` This is the file path to your `.txt` file `clearDraw` This is if you want to clear the entries after a draw. `upperLimit` This is the highest number you want to be avaiable the higher the harder it is to win. `urlPath` This is the url for the browswer source you created from the codepen.

### Lotto NumberOfTickets

`filePath` This is the file path to your `.txt` file

### Lotto Ticket

`filePath` This is the file path to your `.txt` file `ticketCost` This is how many points each ticket costs `ticketLimit` This is the max number of tickets a user can buy. `upperLimit` This is the highest number you want to be avaiable the higher the harder it is to win. `ticketsToBuyMax` This is the max number of tickets a user can buy in one go.
